short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a list of useful technology related articles, blog post to stay up to date

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As an AI Engineer, for keeping me up to date with latest technologies I keep reading articles, research papers, blog posts daily. So, I though what if other peoples can also get that list of articles, blog posts easily which I filtered during my exploration time & found to be useful. So, I created this extension that pulls list of articles or blog posts that I update daily based on my reading list.
